content.question: Predict how a loss-of-function mutation in the p53 gene is most likely to affect the cell cycle in response to DNA damage. Justify your predictions.

frqParts.text: Predict how a loss-of-function mutation in the p53 gene is most likely to affect the cell cycle in response to DNA damage. Justify your predictions.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
